choices:
If the article is relevant to the U.S. economy, what is the main type of economic information covered in this article? Please select which.
  • Macroeconomic / General Economic Conditions [in the U.S.]
  • Firm-specific [articles focused on a single business]
  • Industry-specific [articles focused on multiple/all businesses within a single sector e.g. the steel industry]
  • Government revenue and expenses [articles focused on lawmaking and government action including treaties, regulation, taxes, laws, and spending]
  • Personal [articles focused on an individual or small group of individuals]
  • Other [articles that do not fit into any of the above categories but are relevant to the U.S. economy]
  • Not Relevant to the U.S. Economy
